title: LSEG plans Digital Securities Depository for on-chain settlement
snippet: The London Stock Exchange Group (LSEG) has unveiled the latest leg of its tokenization strategy, a Digital Securities Sandbox (DSD) which it plans to launch this year, subject to regulatory approval. title: Fiserv launches real-time cash settlement platform for digital asset firms
snippet: Fiserv, Inc. (NASDAQ: FISV), a leading global provider of payments and financial services technology, today announced the launch of INDX, a real-time cash settlement platform that helps digital asset companies securely store and transfer US dollars in real-time 24x7x365.

title: BlackRock enters DeFi, taps Uniswap for institutional token trading
snippet: BlackRock is bringing its $2.1 billion tokenized Treasury fund to Uniswap, expanding institutional access to DeFi and deepening Wall Street’s push into onchain finance.

title: LSEG to build on-chain settlement utility
snippet: LSEG today announces plans to build an on-chain settlement capability, the LSEG Digital Securities Depository (DSD).

title: UK government appoints HSBC for tokenized bond pilot
snippet: The UK appointed HSBC Orion for its DIGIT pilot to explore blockchain bonds, aiming to improve efficiency, cut costs and boost security.

title: Bankers push OCC to slow crypto trust charters until GENIUS rules clarified
snippet: The American Bankers Association pressed the OCC to delay new national trust bank charters for crypto and stablecoin firms until the GENIUS Act framework is fully in place.

title: Thailand's SEC Clears Path for Crypto-Linked Derivatives
snippet: Thailand will allow digital assets to back regulated derivatives, deepening crypto’s role in its capital markets.

title: Kast and Pudgy Penguins launch IP-backed stablecoin card
snippet: Kast, the global financial platform built on stablecoin rails, today announces a partnership with Pudgy Penguins to launch an IP-backed stablecoin card – a product that brings Web3 culture into everyday, real world spending.

title: HSBC wins Government tender for digital gilts pilot
snippet: HSBC has won a public tender to provide a blockchain platform for the UK Government's Digital Gilt Instrument (Digit) pilot issuance.

title: US credit union regulator proposes stablecoin licensing path

title: Chainlink feeds go live for Ondo tokenized US stocks on Ethereum
snippet: Price feeds for SPYon, QQQon and TSLAon are now live on Ethereum, allowing the Ondo-issued tokenized equities to be used as collateral in DeFi lending markets.
